textAfterTable: About GI Engineering Solutions Ltd. GI Engineering Solutions Ltd., incorporated in the year 2006, is a Small Cap company (having a market cap of Rs 2.66 Cr.) operating in Information Technology sector. GI Engineering Solutions Ltd. key Products/Revenue Segments include Computer Software which contributed Rs 0.06 Cr to Sales Value (100.00% of Total Sales), for the year ending 31-Mar-2014. For the quarter ended 31-Mar-2015, the company has reported a Standalone sales of Rs. 0.01 Cr., up 81.01% from last quarter Sales of Rs. 0.01 Cr. and up 104.29% from last year same quarter Sales of Rs. 0.01 Cr. Company has reported net profit after tax of Rs. -0.01 Cr. in latest quarter. The company’s management includes Mr.Deeraj Nair, Ms.Veena Mishra, Mr.Ganapathy Vishwanathan, Mr.Ganesh Acharya, Mr.Sajid Malik, Mrs.Saroja Malik. Company has Dixit Dattatray & Associates as its auditors. As on 30-Jun-2015, the company has a total of 8,611,878 shares outstanding.
